-1.title: Temptation
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Its about to old friends that come together after not seeing each other for 15 years , both were old time gangsters in their time but one has taken the road to settling down while the other is still up to his tricks, eventually Warren the bad one of the two starts blackmailing Barry the goodfellow into doing a couple of jobs for him or else he will expose him to his new wife , he goes along with the plan until Barry retaliates and wants out, Warren decides to kidnap Barry's Mrs until he does what he is told , Lots of small twist and turns , with eventually his son Jack saves the day .
imdb.title: Family and Friends
plot: Its about to old friends that come together after not seeing each other for 15 years , both were old time gangsters in their time but one has taken the road to settling down while the other is still up to his tricks, eventually Warren the bad one of the two starts blackmailing Barry the goodfellow into doing a couple of jobs for him or else he will expose him to his new wife , he goes along with the plan until Barry retaliates and wants out, Warren decides to kidnap Barry's Mrs until he does what he is told , Lots of small twist and turns , with eventually his son Jack saves the day .::Rene Costa
